src_text: Determinismu tecnològicu est unu cuntzetu chi imprassat una banda manna de ideas pràticas, dae sa tecnologia de ispinta o s'imperativu tecnològicu a unu sentidu istrintu chi su destinu umanu est ghiadu dae una lògica sutaistante assotziada cun sas leges iscientìficas e sa manifestatzione issoro in sa tecnologia.

The term was coined by Thorstein Veblen, who believed that technology was the most important factor in the evolution of society. He argued that the development of technology was the driving force behind the evolution of society, and that the development of technology was the result of the evolution of society. He believed that technology was the most important factor in the evolution of society, and that the development of technology was the result of the evolution of society.
